modifier.dreamtinker.realsweep.descripti: A easier and much supreme sweep attack; If level larger than 1, the modifiers on the weapon would be trigger as well
modifier.dreamtinker.strong_heavy.descri: if user not have speed/strength, or on a moving live entity, weakness is applied; Otherwise weakness is removed
modifier.dreamtinker.strong_explode.flav: High-yield strike detected. Hope you brought your helmet!
modifier.dreamtinker.strong_explode.desc: Multiply tool damage based on modifier level
modifier.dreamtinker.echoed_attack.flavo: The Deep Dark will bury you.
modifier.dreamtinker.echoed_attack.descr: deal a follow-up attack on melee, or double damage on ranged; When triggered, echo energy is gathered and would trigger a sonic beam
modifier.dreamtinker.echoed_defence.flav: Warden: I do not think I have such ability
modifier.dreamtinker.glacial_river.descr: in exchange of HP, deal extra damage
modifier.dreamtinker.broken_vessel.descr: Boost max HP in exchange of......
modifier.dreamtinker.ewige_widerkunft.fl: Unterlasse es, zu sagen: „Verweile doch, du bist so schön!“
modifier.dreamtinker.ewige_widerkunft.de: Every break make this weapon stronger
item.dreamtinker.tntarrow.description: a consumable, special melee weapon.range less than exploding range！
item.dreamtinker.masu.description: Composing poetry while wielding a spear—truly a hero of his time!----a special heave spear that slow and sweep. Need to ride something or with strength effect otherwise apply weakness to self
tooltip.nigrescence_antimony.desc1: Void-Antimony, Corruptum Antimonii,Antimony of the First Death......Names so manifold it doth bear
tooltip.nigrescence_antimony.desc2: And lo, the means of its grasping are but simple.
